title: [Large-scale] Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Workflow-Based Double-Loop Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizes real-time interaction and learner-led process modification in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can reflect on and revise their cognitive strategies during mathematical problem-solving, applying improved approaches in over 80% of assignments
Learners can design at least three personalized mathematical learning workflows on a four-week cycle using provided "atomic behavior" elements
Learners can analyze problem-solving processes at the double-loop learning level based on peer feedback and instructor guidance, documenting them twice weekly in a learning journal

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
